lenders.occupational_info:
Founded in 2002, Kalabo Media Group is revolutionizing online urban marketing, connecting local, national and international users to all facets of the digital media industry. With visionaries looking ahead, the Kalabo Media Group family has created "The Digital Experience" and made history in the digital media business.
  
Rok Roka, founder and CEO of Kalabo Media Group, a technical enthusiast fused a hobby, his skills and a passion for the movement to launch Kalabo Media Group. In result, Kalabo Media Group improved the always thriving digital media industry and filled a niche that both retailers and consumers alike were searching for.

lenders.name: Howard

lenders.name: laila
lenders.loan_because:
I am a very ambitious girl, I always hoped to be a fashion designer, and I did not have the means to study, so I decided to learn it alone. hamdollah and I have done, and I started to have multiple clients, I had a small workshop at home and we lived in Casablanca (which belonged to the company or my father work before being retired) . but almost a year since we were doing out of our house without a sub, then we change the city, and we rent a small house. 
so I lost my studio, and my clients (and for some time) the strength to start again. 
When I visited this site I saw that there are plenty of people who need help more than me, and they must have more luck. and I want to help as best I can, but at the same time, I think I can help more if I repeated what I already do and what I am sure to realize, because I love my work, and after that I was able to do before
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a very ambitious girl, I always hoped to be a fashion designer, and I did not have the means to study, so I decided to learn it alone. hamdollah and I have done, and I started to have multiple clients, I had a small workshop at home and we lived in Casablanca (which belonged to the company or my father work before being retired) . but almost a year since we were doing out of our house without a sub, then we change the city, and we rent a small house. 
so I lost my studio, and my clients (and for some time) the strength to start again. 
When I visited this site I saw that there are plenty of people who need help more than me, and they must have more luck. and I want to help as best I can, but at the same time, I think I can help more if I repeated what I already do and what I am sure to realize, because I love my work, and after that I was able to do before. i wanna put some pic for what i did before but i dont know where

lenders.name: Pastor Michael & Gloria Evans
lenders.loan_because: Because "He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again"  Proverbs 19:17
lenders.occupational_info: We help people get where they want to go -- spirit, soul, and body.

lenders.name: Magni
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of microloans, and Kiva provided a simple way of doing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and internet.

lenders.name: Jim Howard
lenders.loan_because: although I didn't know about Kiva until I received a Kiva gift certificate from my sister-in-law, I think this is a way an individual can have a more direct impact to help worthy entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: My career has been to serve small businesses by providing loans through the SBA programs by working at bank and non-bank lenders.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because:
Helping others is a mission of love. 
Having and counting with the needed resources to work and make a living for some people who live in many countries is a blessing. Thruogh this wonderful organization I can give and help someone who needs it and in a way help them made their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Rachel & Morgan
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate the efforts made by unique individuals across the world to improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: Being kids is hard work.  There are so many rules to follow!   But we still love our parents.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I feel that we need to help the rest of the world catch up. In addition, if I were in the situation of some of the people needing this money, I would hope that someone would want to help me out.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a graduate student at North Carolina State University. I work as a TA in the Department of Communication.

lenders.name: Kyleen
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to do something good for someone in need.  I want to give back for all the ways that God has blessed me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach French to middle school students.

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate to Kiva and it seems like a great concept.  I love helping others who wish to work hard and help themselves improve their lives.  It is fun to connect with others who share a common goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I design large computer systems.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: It gives me such great pleasure when one of my loans is repaid and I can give it someone else, without having to add any money.  I love knowing I am contributing to a greater cause.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I've been to the 3rd world and I see the problems that exist

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I value hard work and determination. I believe that people hold to this should be given every opportunity possible to succeed. I also give/loan because Christ's overabundance of love for me overflows into my love and hope for the impoverished.
lenders.occupational_info: People can become dissatisfied with their life or experience difficult times emotionally or spiritually. I listen to them and help them overcome mental obstacles that may prevent them from achieving self-worth, relationships, jobs or happiness.

lenders.name: Drew and Grant
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel good to give to someone in need!
lenders.occupational_info: We're in 7th and 5th grades

lenders.name: Phoebe
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the people live better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Wheaton College. I study history and physics.

lenders.name: Karin
lenders.occupational_info: I help people deal with depression, anxiety and feelings from abuse or trauma.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe it's important to help those in need.  I don't have much extra money, so I think microfinancing will help me do the most amount of good with what I have available.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the library at a private university.  I help make materials available to the students, faculty, and also community members.

lenders.name: JPullman
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: A social entrepreneur aims to help build financially profitable companies in pursuit of social, ethical, and/or environmental goals.

lenders.name: Myhre's Advisory Group
lenders.occupation: Students at Minnehaha Academy in Mpls, MN

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I think that everybody should have opportunities and these loans empower people across the world.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: It's great to think that a small effort can make such a big difference in the lives of others!

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur at heart and have always been ever since I can remember.  I want to give back what I can in service to empowering people who have a vision of their life empowered and thriving :)
lenders.occupational_info: As a creator, my work is to imagine the 'what' is possible in service to the greatest good and to get into action in doing all that I can in collaboration with like minded and like hearted beings in realizing this for all. Day to day I work with people in clarifying, communicating and actioning their greatest vision and purpose into being in their lives. Kiva is a wonderful extension of this for me :)

lenders.name: Jo-Anne & Jim
lenders.loan_because: We want to support individuals who are working to improve their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired U. S. government employees who enjoy travel, reading, gardening, the theater, volunteer work and spending time with family & friends.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Ellen and Lee
lenders.loan_because: We can, and we care.
lenders.occupational_info: We both teach and do research at a university in the field of psychology.

lenders.name: Wouter
lenders.loan_because: The only wealth which you will keep forever is the wealth you have given away.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a web developer!

lenders.name: Dominican Uni of CA
lenders.loan_because: it is a way for students to become aware of those in extreme poverty who can be empowered to change their own lives thru solidarity by those of us blessed to have funds to invest in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a class of 27 students and professor who are learning the principles and values of Catholic Social teaching that will make our world a place of justice and equity for all in our human community. This is the third year that a class has invested in someone seeking to better opportunites for others. We began with $25 investment and we are up to using the repaid $50 plus a new $25.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because:
First and foremost, I loan to help those in developing countries to uplift themselves.

Secondly, I loan because religion nutjobs like to harp on the lie that Atheists are evil and cannot be charitable.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with computers, writing the software that makes them run.

I also do lots of web development, that makes the internet run.

lenders.name: Chuck Dunning
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference, and as a Freemason it's important to me to help build a more loving and united world.  Even though I am not rich by standards in the USA, there are people who can benefit greatly from the kind of money I might casually spend on things I don't really need.  Kiva allows me to see that this money isn't just being dumped into the bottomless pit of a poorly managed charitable organization, but is actually helping people improve the conditions of their lives and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in student affairs at a university, and I also teach.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe the individual has the opportunity, the responsibility and the desire to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a senior at UNCW and work in the International Office on campus.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: While I don't have much, I do have some; and the needs of some are much greater than mine.  It's that simple.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired military officer and engineer.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies choose and deploy hand-held computers into the workplace.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an International Business/Human Resources Management student at the University of South Carolina.  I've begun to focus my thesis work and classes towards human resources, developing countries and social responsibility.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed by the help of God, and everyone around me, especially my family and friends, and I want to spread the love I've received by blessing others and helping them to succeed.

lenders.name: jorge
lenders.loan_because: because what we need is for a disabled asociasion in the state of Oaxaca, Mexico is to acquire a wheelchair because tenmos some in very poor conditions and because in this state not to acquire reibimos nucha help our chairs and thus able to train Wheelchair basketball and thus also to support our children ke are suffering from cleft lip and cleft palate and to help me since I am a single dad and the mother of my children and I am leaving I leave much hope with your help thank you.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is a daily struggle that I have to face because of my disability is more difficult to do things that makes a healthy person but I'm not giving up the face of adversity and this test I'm going and I earn too little to survive and over two wonderful children who would not leave it for the world no matter how I am and that is why I go to everyone for help and hope to feel supported thousand thanks for your help and attention. att. Jorge Cordova

lenders.name: Soapworks Studio
lenders.loan_because: I'm so grateful that I've been able to make a living from my own small home-based craft business.  I wanted to share a small portion of my profits with others who need a helping hand to make their own businesses around the globe sustainable too.
lenders.occupational_info: I handcraft my own soap and other bath and beauty products which I sell at street fairs and craft shows, as well as over the internet.

lenders.name: Emeline
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference, no matter how small
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in my first year of college, studying political sciences in Paris.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I think it matters.

lenders.name: tariq
lenders.occupation: computer technical and call center employee

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Micro banking allows me to help females in developing countries recieve education.

lenders.name: Amulya
lenders.loan_because: During my short existence, if I can make a small difference in someone’s life I will consider my life worth living.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an average person with a loving wife and a beautiful son. I get up in the morning, I go to work, I come back home in the evening, spend some time with my close friends. Then I start the day all over.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: While I can't change the whole world, that doesn't change the fact that I can change the world for those I do help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help employees understand what is really important in their job so they can spend more time doing it and less time with busy work.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I can invest in the hopes and dreams of people around the world. I can't imagine a better way to get richer.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people the skills to be more powerful versions of themselves using technology

lenders.name: Dipam
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion to see God's Kingdom come on earth as it is in heaven, and helping others through micro-finance is one great way to participate in that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a professor of Religion and History so I can inspire young people with a vision of God's ongoing work in the world.

lenders.name: Dovida
lenders.loan_because: I simply care. Plus Kiva is one of the coolest projects going on planet earth.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: we need engaged citizens who want to continue improving our world!

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good idea to help jump-start small businesses.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can. We are here to help make a difference. Money comes and goes for us. But for these people a small donation means the world. If giving up starbucks for a week means I can make a difference in someones life then I am more than willing to do it!

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Discovery Software enables me to help people.

lenders.name: Francie & Josie
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed

lenders.name: Elaine and Fabien
lenders.loan_because: We were lucky to get a loan to do what we want. We want others to have that same freedom.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: One day I hope to receive a loan to open an organic bakery in my community. I'm building up karma points, really.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a grocery store selling organic and natural foods. We also carry nutritional supplements and vitamins. I believe in the power of nutrition to alter mind, body, and spirit in a positive direction.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women who are trying to educate their children and/or themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Soy enfermera por mujeres, especialmente sobre amamantando y comidas.

lenders.loan_because: necesito el prestamo para terminar de construir, y poner un negocio
lenders.occupational_info: mi trabajo es muy bueno tengo plaza fija en la Universidad de Guanajuato

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I wish that the world could see all humans as equals; across nationality, or ethnicity, or opportunity.  A small expense for me can save a person's life, and I have been far too selfish with my opportunities and blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student trying my best to pay my way through college.  I get loans so that I can get a good education; other people should be allowed the same opportunity, and basic human trust, to do the same.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I would like to open my own buisness someday and I will need support from others in order to make this happen!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student.

lenders.name: janice
lenders.loan_because: I have so much.  They have so little.  It's my attempt to make it a little less unfair.

lenders.name: Lucas
lenders.occupational_info: I am in 6th grade in State College, Pennsylvania (home of Penn State University).  I play soccer and guitar.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: People need the opportunity to make their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: It is empowering in this world of doom and gloom to know that I can change the lives of someone with a very simple gesture and no risk!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother of 2 grown children.  I have a restaurant that buys from local farmers.  I am trying to help my community here as well as elsewhere.

lenders.name: Rich Thigpen
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people
lenders.occupational_info: computer stuff--mostly server and desktop support.

lenders.occupational_info:
I write about medicine, health and
social issues

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: people deserve a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find books and information.

lenders.name: alice

lenders.name: Sisel
lenders.loan_because: This is our world, our home, our future

lenders.name: Danverse
lenders.loan_because: I do not value money.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service Support. The least rewarding job I can think of. Ha ha.

lenders.name: ShaneOPalooza
lenders.loan_because: $25 never helps this much in America and the people we help are on the right track to persue their own goals.

lenders.name: justin
lenders.loan_because: i like to make other people happy ^_^
lenders.occupational_info: i go to school and help on my parents farm

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I need and I want everyone to feel the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I love art and making things look interesting or beautiful. I try to do that with my graphic design business, but usually just end up making things how other people want them to look. My husband and I work for ourselves and understand the value of support when starting or expanding your own business.

lenders.name: May
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I loan because the planet is my neighborhood and people everywhere are my neighbors.

lenders.name: Lessie
lenders.loan_because: I believe individuals worldwide should get the chance to work hard toward their goals. And it's super cool to be involved and connected with their progress and to be able to re-lend.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a grant program working with underprivileged middle school youth.  We get them college-bound and stay with them through high school until their first year of college.

lenders.name: emdaykk
lenders.loan_because: to help people
lenders.occupational_info: not working yet, just chores at home.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I know that microfinance is a very effective way to help the needy and assist developing countries. I like to know I'm helping someone, not by handing out money, but by giving someone an honest chance to work towards improving his or her life and help a developing economy at the same time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large supermarket doing many things to help customers and keep the store running smoothly.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a blessing in the life of others. I have been blessed and that is my simple way to give back. I also have my own charity foundation to help children in developping countries going to school for free.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is fun, simple, and I am very proud to be my own boss. I have an online gallery & Store that helps me collect more money to fund my charity and loan more money on KIVA.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to provide opportunities to others and to address the inequality in the world.  Kiva provides a measurable way to make a direct impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Leadership North Carolina informs and engages leaders from business, nonprofits, education and government about the key issues facing our state.  We host six two-day sessions to learn about the environment, education, economic development, government and health and human services.  Our goal is to increase the number of informed and engaged leaders who are committed to volunteer service.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
one person can make a difference.

And at the end of the day, it's not about us or them. These people are my brothers and sisters, and I wouldn't turn my back on family.

We are all one, just living in my different places, doing many different things, living in my different bodies.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I've saw the power of micro-finance when I was a Peace Corps volunteer.  A loan has the power to change lives.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because:
I have always been empathetic to the human suffering and especially the poverty of our fellow man around the world.
Frustrated by the monumental task of helping ,a friend introduced me to KIVA and the concept of how far a meager donation can go in giving dignity and alleviating suffering in the lives of my fellow kin around the world , I have been SOLD since and I hope to be a strong proponent of this noble cause!!!
Please join us in our small effort in making this world a better place!

lenders.name: Dajania
lenders.occupational_info: Managing Director of Green Pastures, a student, stock investor and fashion enthusiast.

lenders.name: Saleha Rasheed C Trust
lenders.loan_because: To thank Allah SWT for the bounties He has given us. Charity is one of the pillars of Islam. Giving is an opportunity to remind ourselves that we are better than the millions who are under privileged.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a family of 5 brothers and 2 sisters who formed a charitable trust in the name of our parents. 

As a joint family our father used to pool the Zakat funds of his children and distribute to the needy muslims and madarsas / organisations engaged in educational assistance / upliftment of poverty. 

While the family has grown to the 3rd generation we maintained the tradition of pooling of Zakat funds.

Later. we decided to involve our children and formalised the activity by registering a legal entity named Saleha Rasheed Charitable Trust.
